Odoo - 4 Pillars of Agility

As a business is dynamic and processes are constantly changing, so should the systems used to manage the business. Odoo is highly flexible, but has its challenges with agility. The best Odoo integrators will be experts in key areas dubbed the "4 Pillars of Agility".

  • Testing

    Testing is the backbone of any change or new development in an Odoo system. The ability of the integrator to efficiently create and maintain tests is a key indicator of success. This includes all forms of testing: unit testing, integration testing, performance testing ...

  • Migrations

    Migrations are the implementation of a change to the system environment. The primary challenge in Odoo is migrating the database schema, but any change can cause ripple effects up and down the system. The best integrators will have reliable and efficient processes to confidently implement migrations.

  • Data Quality Assurance

    Data Quality Assurance is important for the business for monitoring KPI's and making confident decisions, but is also critical for the integrator for testing and making system changes. The best integrators will devise monitoring systems and audit procedures to identify irregularities in data and quickly act to resolve any issues.

  • Documentation

    Documentation is critical to ensure a deep understanding of the business system and the processes it manages. The best integrators will maintain documentation that reflects the most current state of the system and provide it to the business customer as part of the training process, ideally within the Odoo system itself. Documentation should be version controlled alongside the source code and treated as importantly as data schemas and algorithms.
